quests.name: An Icy Invitation
objectives: Follow Anna to the bridge in the Forest of Valor
Talk to Anna about the stumps blocking the bridge in the Forest.
Search for the right book in Anna's House.
Bring the book to Anna.

Gather the materials to upgrade your shovel
  ‧ 10 Softwood
  ‧ 4 Hardwood
  ‧ 4 Iron Ingot
  ‧ 3 Tinkering Parts
Craft the Shovel Blade at a Crafting Station
Use the Shovel Blade in your inventory
Remove the tree stumps blocking the wooden bridge in the Forest of Valor
Talk to Anna to tell her the bridge is clear.
Visit the Ice Cavern with Anna
Take a picture of the Ice Cavern
Show the picture to Anna
Make sure you have Anna's Letter in your Backpack
Bring Anna's Letter to Elsa in the Frozen Realm
Tell Anna the good news.

quests.name: Lost Loves and Missing Memories
objectives: Listen as Anna talks to Kristoff.
Talk to Anna.
Look for Kristoff's Climbing Gear on Dazzle Beach near the cliffs.
Bring Kristoff's Climbing Gear to Anna

Gather the materials to fix Kristoff's Climbing Gear:
  ‧ 8 Hardwood
  ‧ 5 Fabric
  ‧ 3 Rope
  ‧ 3 Iron Ingot
Repair Kristoff's Climbing Gear at a Crafting Station
Make sure you have Kristoff's Climbing Gear in your Backpack.
Bring Kristoff's Climbing Gear to Anna
Listen as Anna gives Kristoff his climbing gear
See how Anna feels

quests.name: The Enchanted Ring
objectives: Talk to Merlin
Talk to Anna to get her Engagement Ring.

Gather the following Ingredients
  ‧ 10 Dream Shard
  ‧ 3 Red Mushroom from the Giant Willow Tree in the Glade of Trust
Enchant the Engagement Ring at a Crafting Station.
Bring the Enchanted Ring to Anna.
Listen as Anna shows Kristoff the ring.
Talk to Anna to see how she's feeling.

quests.name: Do You Wanna Build a Snowman?
objectives:
Get these items for Elsa:
  ‧ Birthday Cake
  ‧ Book of Portraits
Bring the Birthday Cake and Book of Portraits to Elsa.
Talk to Anna.

Gather the materials to craft a Snow Family:
  ‧ 40 Snowball
  ‧ 12 Pebbles
  ‧ 8 Fabric
  ‧ 8 Dry Wood
  ‧ 8 Carrot
Talk to Anna.
Craft the Snow Family.
Place the Snow Family in the Forest of Valor
Attend the party with the Snow Family
